## Attach packages

To begin with, we should attach the tidyverse packages.

```{r}
#| label: setup

library(tidyverse)
```

## Read data

In the following code chunk with read a few data frames.

```{r}
#| label: gestures

gestures <- read_csv("data/cameron2020/gestures.csv")

glot_status <- readRDS("data/coretta2022/glot_status.rds")
```

The data frames are:

- `gestures` with infant gesture data from @cameron2020.
- `glot_status` with data on the endangerment status of languages from Glottolog.
